content: SPX Universal Diamond Cup-Wheel (For DG/DGH 150) Ultimate diamond cup wheel for the DG/DGH 150 diamond grinder – for faster grinding of concrete, screed and natural stone ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Diamond blades and cup wheels- - - ### FEATURES:Features Rapid grinding speed thanks to the dense concentration of highest-quality diamonds Advanced hole pattern – constantly cools the steel disc to prolong its lifetime Creates a smooth surface finish using an optimized mixture of diamonds in various grits sizes Low vibration thanks to advanced core balancing technology Engineered for reliability – CD welding and highest-grade materials used throughout Applications Grinding concrete and natural stone ### TECHNICAL DATA: Tool type: Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 Base material: Concrete, Screed, Natural stone Product Class: Ultimate Technical Data | Tool type | Concrete grinder DG/DGH 150 | Base material | Concrete, Screed, Natural stone | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2270778 - 6 SPX Universal Diamond Cup Wheel - Package Size 1 pc - 2270779 - (6) 6 SPX Universal Diamond Cup Wheel - Package Size 6 pc
